meet Duckie Duckie is a grey tuxedo who loves belly rubs treats and his little brother Birdie PERIOD Duckuie can play fetch with his toys and his 



David Ruskos family spent Christmas with him at Ruby Memorial Hospital PERIOD

Three students agreed to a permanent separation from WVU after an investigation into a students fall at a fraternity house according to a University news release PERIOD

The fraternitySigma Alpha Epsilon remains under interim suspension after being placed under it in November according to the release which was sent on Tuesday morning PERIOD About  students have agreed to other disciplinary actions PERIOD

David Rusko a senior finance student from Uniontown Pennsylvania who was set to graduate in May fell down the steps at the Sigma Alpha Epsilon fraternity house while visiting his fraternity brothers on Nov PERIOD  according to a Nov PERIOD  WVU press release PERIOD

Officers discovered that more than two hours lapsed between Ruskos fall and a  call for help according to the release PERIOD
